channel.title: Npc attacking problems?
channel.description:
If you dont retaliate against the npcs' there hit and damage is fine, splats fine, everything works, but as soon as you click/attack an npc, client crashes with a size mismatch error and a java thread-5 exception.[/img]http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/7564/packeterror.png[/img]
If you could help me out in any way it would be greatly appreciated :) To help contact mazterdragoon@gmail.com Thanks :)
